jupyterNotebook.html: Calling a color with seaborn works exactly the same way with matplotlib. Thus, see the dedicated page that gives extensive explanations. However, here is a list of the available colors if you want to call them by their name (source).

metadata.title: Calling a Color with Seaborn
metadata.description: This post provides a list of available color names that you can use with seaborn.
metadata.seoDescription: How to call a color with seaborn in python
metadata.keywords: python, chart, plot, seaborn, matplotlib, colors
